text: There will be no power supply in the following areas from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on February 16 owing to maintenance work at the Namakkal power sub-station: Namakkal; Nallipalayam; Ayyampalayam; Uthamapalayam; Kondisettipatti; Vagurampatti; Vasanthapuram; Vepanatham; Periyapatti; Kosavampatti; Reddipatti; Thoosur; Muthukapatti; Muthalaipatti; Podupatti; NGO Colony; Veesanam and Sinnamuthalaipatti.
title: TAMIL NADU
